name: Tuna Scalloped Potatoes
author: sal
summary: Tuna, potatoes and onions, layered and topped with a mushroom soup and mustard sauce, then baked.
ingredients: 6 cups baking potatoes, peeled and sliced
½ cup condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 10 minutes; Drain
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
In a saucepan, combine yellow mustard, flour, milk, salt and 1/2 cup of soup
Mix thoroughly and heat until thickened
Starting with the potatoes, arrange the potatoes, tuna and onions, in alternating layers in a 9x13 inch baking dish
Pour the mustard sauce all over the top
Bake in a preheated oven for 1 hour or until hot and bubbly
